[vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” el_class=”page-mainheading-section”][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Product Offering” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”page-heading-text”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section css=”.vc_custom_1678085894177{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”inner-page-text-div”][vc_custom_heading text=”HealPACK includes a wide variety of products that promote a healthy healing process.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1739499762292{margin-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Collagen Dressing” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”The collagen dressings are porous collagen membranes which are designed to be
permeable and breathable, with fluid control similar to skin. They are flexible, pliable,
elastic, and durable for ease of application.

Indications: Surgical wounds, dehisced surgical wounds and traumatic wounds,
diabetic ulcers, pressure ulcers, and venous stasis ulcers.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Collagen Powder” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”The particles have a high surface area, allowing them to effectively penetrate and
deliver the maximum amount of collagen into the wound surface.

Indications: Surgical wounds, dehisced surgical wounds, and traumatic wounds diabetic
ulcers, pressure ulcers, and venous stasis ulcers.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Silicone Composite Dressing” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”The Silicone composite dressings are absorbent, have a non-traumatic border, and
provide an ideal cover for wounds of many types. These dressings are indicated as a
secondary dressing to cover primary dressings. They assist in protecting the wound and
preventing bacterial contamination or maceration. These dressings are waterproof.

Indications: Post surgery sites, post operative wounds, diabetic ulcers, pressure ulcers,
venous ulcers, and lacerations.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Island Composite Dressing” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300aae9″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”These dressings contain a non-adherent contact layer that covers the wound site. It
consists of a soft absorbent pad that collects exudate and protects the wound from
trauma. It also has a non-woven backing with an adhesive border that is gentle and
holds the pad in place. The island composite dressing also has a waterproof backing to
keep wounds dry and keep external contaminants out.

Indications: Post surgery sites, post operative wounds, diabetic ulcers, pressure ulcers,
venous ulcers, and lacerations.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”SEE HOW WE CAN HELP” color=”danger” el_class=”banner-btn-div” link=”url:%2Fcontact%2F|title:Contact%20Us”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”service-page-icon-div”][vc_single_image image=”2203″ img_size=”full”][vc_row_inner el_class=”approach-icon-section”][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”1879″ title=”Sign up as a prescribing HealPACK physician and receive a Provider Box of free samples.” el_class=”quality-icon-list”][vc_single_image image=”1877″ title=”Establish medical necessity during initial patient wound assessments.” el_class=”quality-icon-list”][vc_single_image image=”1883″ title=”Use a free HealPACK sample for the initial wound dressing.” el_class=”quality-icon-list”][vc_single_image image=”1906″ title=”Issue SWO (IVR) for up to one month’s supply of daily HealPACK for the patient.” el_class=”quality-icon-list”][vc_single_image image=”1902″ title=”The specified supply of HealPACK is shipped to the patient’s permanent residence.” el_class=”quality-icon-list”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” el_class=”home-about-section about-page-section service-page-section”][vc_row el_class=”about-home-text-div”][vc_column width=”7/12″ offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8″][vc_custom_heading text=”We’re Here For You” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical Supplies cares for patients in the long-term care setting throughout Ohio. Reach out to find out if your facility is within our ever-expanding service territory.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”5/12″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][vc_btn title=”REACH OUT” color=”danger” el_class=”banner-btn-div home-page-leyer-btn” link=”url:%2Fcontact%2F”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section][vc_section disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1699907453697{margin-top: 60px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”service-list-div”][vc_single_image image=”1289″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”servi-img-div”][vc_row_inner el_class=”service-text-div” css=”.vc_custom_1678095229230{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”ACUTE & CHRONIC ON-SITE WOUND CARE” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300838d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore specializes in on-site wound care, including biologic wound healing therapies.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”START HEALING” style=”outline” color=”danger” el_class=”servi-btn-div” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fwound-care%2F|title:Wound%20Care”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”service-list-div”][vc_single_image image=”1503″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”servi-img-div”][vc_row_inner el_class=”service-text-div” css=”.vc_custom_1678095229230{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”DURABLE MEDICAL EQUIPMENT” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300838d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Full-service care includes prescribing and providing DME direct-dropped to your practice or facility for a seamless patient care experience.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”GET WHAT YOU NEED” style=”outline” color=”danger” el_class=”servi-btn-div” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fencoreclinicalservices.com%2Fservices%2Fdurable-medical-equipment%2F|title:Durable%20Medical%20Equipment”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”service-list-div”][vc_single_image image=”1548″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”servi-img-div”][vc_row_inner el_class=”service-text-div” css=”.vc_custom_1678095229230{margin-right: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BIOLOGICS” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300838d” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore provides progressive wound healing solutions using biologic wound healing therapies—helping speed healing and improving patient quality of life.” font_container=”tag:p|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”Benefits of Biologics” style=”outline” color=”danger” el_class=”servi-btn-div” link=”url:%2Fservices%2Fbiologics%2F|title:Biologics”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Encore Surgical Supplies strives to provide clinical expertise, medical technology and compassion to those in long-term care and rehabilitation facilities. We operate as an extension of your team, improving patient quality of life.” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left|color:%2300838d” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”service-list-text-div”][/vc_column][/vc_row][/vc_section]

<title>Exceptional On-Site Wound Care and Chronic Care Management Services - Encore Surgical Supplies</title>
<meta name="description" content="Our nurse practitioner model specializes in providing comprehensive on-site wound care, chronic care management, and remote patient monitoring services for adult and geriatric patients in long-term care settings." />
